code: Inductive Ens : Type := sup : forall A : Type, (A -> Ens) -> Ens.
Inductive EXType (P : Type) (Q : P -> Prop) : Prop := EXTypei : forall x : P, Q x -> EXType P Q.
Inductive prod_t (A B : Type) : Type := pair_t : A -> B -> prod_t A B.
Inductive depprod (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) : Type := dep_i : forall x : A, P x -> depprod A P.
simple induction 1; intros A f eq1.
simple induction 1; intros B g eq2.
exact (forall x : A, EXType _ (fun y : B => eq1 x (g y))).
exact (forall y : B, EXType _ (fun x : A => eq1 x (g y))).
Definition IN (E1 E2 : Ens) : Prop := match E2 with | sup A f => EXType _ (fun y : A => EQ E1 (f y)) end.
exact (forall E : Ens, IN E E1 -> IN E E2).
Theorem EQ_refl : forall E : Ens, EQ E E.
Theorem EQ_tran : forall E1 E2 E3 : Ens, EQ E1 E2 -> EQ E2 E3 -> EQ E1 E3.
simple induction E1; intros A1 f1 r1; simple induction E2; intros A2 f2 r2; simple induction E3; intros A3 f3 r3; simpl in |- *; intros e1 e2.
split; (elim e1; intros I1 I2; elim e2; intros I3 I4).
intros a1; elim (I1 a1); intros a2.
intros a3; elim (I4 a3); intros a2; elim (I2 a2); intros a1; exists a1.
Theorem EQ_sym : forall E1 E2 : Ens, EQ E1 E2 -> EQ E2 E1.
simple induction E1; intros A1 f1 r1; simple induction E2; intros A2 f2 r2; simpl in |- *; simple induction 1; intros e1 e2; split.
intros a2; elim (e2 a2); intros a1 H1; exists a1; auto.
intros a1; elim (e1 a1); intros a2 H2; exists a2; auto.
Theorem EQ_INC : forall E E' : Ens, EQ E E' -> INC E E'.
simple induction E; intros A f r; simple induction E'; intros A' f' r'; simpl in |- *; simple induction 1; intros e1 e2; unfold INC in |- *; simpl in |- *.
intros C; simple induction 1; intros a ea; elim (e1 a); intros a' ea'; exists a'.
Hint Resolve EQ_sym EQ_refl EQ_INC: zfc.
Theorem INC_EQ : forall E E' : Ens, INC E E' -> INC E' E -> EQ E E'.
simple induction E; intros A f r; simple induction E'; intros A' f' r'; unfold INC in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros I1 I2; split.
intros a'; cut (EXType A (fun x : A => EQ (f' a') (f x))).
simple induction 1; intros a ea; exists a; auto with zfc.
apply I2; exists a'; auto with zfc.
Theorem IN_sound_left : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E E' -> IN E E'' -> IN E' E''.
simple induction E''; intros A'' f'' r'' e; simpl in |- *; simple induction 1; intros a'' p; exists a''; apply EQ_tran with E; auto with zfc.
Theorem IN_sound_right : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E' E'' -> IN E E' -> IN E E''.

simple induction E'; intros A' f' r'; simple induction E''; intros A'' f'' r''; simpl in |- *; simple induction 1; intros e1 e2; simple induction 1; intros a' e'; elim (e1 a'); intros a'' e''; exists a''; apply EQ_tran with (f' a'); assumption.
Theorem INC_refl : forall E : Ens, INC E E.
unfold INC in |- *; auto with zfc.
Theorem INC_tran : forall E E' E'' : Ens, INC E E' -> INC E' E'' -> INC E E''.
unfold INC in |- *; auto with zfc.
Theorem INC_sound_left : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E E' -> INC E E'' -> INC E' E''.
simple induction E''; unfold INC in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros A f HR e H1 E0 i; apply H1.
apply IN_sound_right with E'; auto with zfc.
Theorem INC_sound_right : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E' E'' -> INC E E' -> INC E E''.
simple induction E'; simple induction E''; unfold INC in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros.
elim H1; intros HA HB; elim (HA x); intros.
exists x0; apply EQ_tran with (e x); auto with zfc.
Definition Vide : Ens := sup F (fun f : F => match f return Ens with end).
Theorem Vide_est_vide : forall E : Ens, IN E Vide -> F.
unfold Vide in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros E H; cut False.
elim H; intros x; elim x.
Theorem tout_vide_est_Vide : forall E : Ens, (forall E' : Ens, IN E' E -> F) -> EQ E Vide.
unfold Vide in |- *; simple induction E; simpl in |- *; intros A e H H0; split.
intros; elim (H0 (e x)); auto with zfc.
Definition Paire : forall E E' : Ens, Ens.
Theorem Paire_sound_left : forall A A' B : Ens, EQ A A' -> EQ (Paire A B) (Paire A' B).
Theorem Paire_sound_right : forall A B B' : Ens, EQ B B' -> EQ (Paire A B) (Paire A B').
unfold Paire in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros; split.
Theorem IN_Paire_left : forall E E' : Ens, IN E (Paire E E').
unfold Paire in |- *; simpl in |- *; exists true; simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
Theorem IN_Paire_right : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Paire E E').
unfold Paire in |- *; simpl in |- *; exists false; simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
Theorem Paire_IN : forall E E' A : Ens, IN A (Paire E E') -> EQ A E \/ EQ A E'.
simple induction 1; intros b; elim b; simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
Hint Resolve IN_Paire_left IN_Paire_right Vide_est_vide: zfc.
Definition Sing (E : Ens) := Paire E E.
Theorem IN_Sing : forall E : Ens, IN E (Sing E).
unfold Sing in |- *; auto with zfc.
Theorem IN_Sing_EQ : forall E E' : Ens, IN E (Sing E') -> EQ E E'.
unfold Sing in |- *; intros E E' H; elim (Paire_IN E' E' E); auto with zfc.
Theorem Sing_sound : forall A A' : Ens, EQ A A' -> EQ (Sing A) (Sing A').
unfold Sing in |- *; intros; apply EQ_tran with (Paire A A'); auto with zfc.
Theorem EQ_Sing_EQ : forall E1 E2 : Ens, EQ (Sing E1) (Sing E2) -> EQ E1 E2.
apply IN_sound_right with (Sing E1); auto with zfc.
Inductive sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x : A, P x -> sig A P.
simple induction 1; intros A f fr P.
simple induction 1; intros x p; exact (f x).
Theorem Comp_INC : forall (E : Ens) (P : Ens -> Prop), INC (Comp E P) E.
unfold Comp, INC in |- *; simple induction E; simpl in |- *; intros.
elim H0; simple induction x; intros; exists x0; auto with zfc.
Theorem IN_Comp_P : forall (E A : Ens) (P : Ens -> Prop), (forall w1 w2 : Ens, P w1 -> EQ w1 w2 -> P w2) -> IN A (Comp E P) -> P A.
simple induction E; simpl in |- *; intros B f Hr A P H i; elim i; intros c; elim c; simpl in |- *; intros x q e; apply H with (f x); auto with zfc.
Theorem IN_P_Comp : forall (E A : Ens) (P : Ens -> Prop), (forall w1 w2 : Ens, P w1 -> EQ w1 w2 -> P w2) -> IN A E -> P A -> IN A (Comp E P).
simple induction E; simpl in |- *; intros B f HR A P H i; elim i; simpl in |- *; intros.
exists (exist B (fun x : B => P (f x)) x Pf); simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
apply H with A; auto with zfc.
Definition pi2 : forall E : Ens, pi1 E -> Ens.
Definition Union : forall E : Ens, Ens.
simple induction 1; intros A f r.
apply (sup (depprod A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x)))).
Theorem EQ_EXType : forall E E' : Ens, EQ E E' -> forall a : pi1 E, EXType (pi1 E') (fun b : pi1 E' => EQ (pi2 E a) (pi2 E' b)).
simple induction E; intros A f r; simple induction E'; intros A' f' r'; simpl in |- *; simple induction 1; intros e1 e2 a.
Theorem IN_EXType : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> EXType (pi1 E) (fun a : pi1 E => EQ E' (pi2 E a)).
Theorem IN_Union : forall E E' E'' : Ens, IN E' E -> IN E'' E' -> IN E'' (Union E).
simple induction E; intros A f r.
cut (EQ (pi2 (sup A f) x) E'); auto with zfc.
exists (dep_i A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x)) x x0).
apply IN_sound_right with E'; auto with zfc.
Theorem IN_INC_Union : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> INC E' (Union E).
unfold INC in |- *; simple induction E; intros A f r; unfold Union in |- *.
intros E' i E'' i'; simpl in |- *; elim (IN_EXType (sup A f) E' i).
intros a e; simpl in a; simpl in e.
intros i'' a' e''; elim (IN_EXType _ _ i''); simpl in |- *; intros aa ee.
exists (dep_i A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x)) a aa); auto with zfc.
apply IN_sound_right with E'; auto with zfc.
Theorem Union_IN : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Union E) -> EXType _ (fun E1 : Ens => IN E1 E /\ IN E' E1).
simple induction E; unfold Union in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros A f r.
apply IN_sound_left with (pi2 (f a) b); auto with zfc.
generalize b; elim (f a); simpl in |- *.
Theorem Union_sound : forall E E' : Ens, EQ E E' -> EQ (Union E) (Union E').
unfold Union in |- *; simple induction E; intros A f r; simple induction E'; intros A' f' r'; simpl in |- *; simple induction 1; intros e1 e2; split.
intros x; elim x; intros a aa; elim (e1 a); intros a' ea.
elim (EQ_EXType (f a) (f' a') ea aa); intros aa' eaa.
exists (dep_i A' (fun x : A' => pi1 (f' x)) a' aa'); simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
intros c'; elim c'; intros a' aa'; elim (e2 a'); intros a ea.
intros ea'; elim (EQ_EXType (f' a') (f a) ea' aa'); intros aa eaa.
exists (dep_i A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x)) a aa); auto with zfc.
Theorem Union_mon : forall E E' : Ens, INC E E' -> INC (Union E) (Union E').
unfold INC in |- *; intros E E' IEE E'' IEE''.
intros E'''; simple induction 1; intros I1 I2.
apply IN_Union with E'''; auto with zfc.

Definition Inter (E : Ens) : Ens := match E with | sup A f => sup _ (fun c : depprod _ (fun a : A => depprod _ (fun b : pi1 (f a) => forall x : A, IN (pi2 (f a) b) (f x))) => match c with | dep_i a (dep_i b p) => pi2 (f a) b end) end.
Theorem IN_Inter_all : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Inter E) -> forall E'' : Ens, IN E'' E -> IN E' E''.
simple induction E; intros A f r; simpl in |- *; intros E'.
simple induction 1; intros c; elim c; intros a ca; elim ca; intros aa paa; simpl in |- *.
apply IN_sound_right with (f a1); auto with zfc.
apply IN_sound_left with (pi2 (f a) aa); auto with zfc.
Theorem all_IN_Inter : forall E E' E'' : Ens, IN E'' E -> (forall E'' : Ens, IN E'' E -> IN E' E'') -> IN E' (Inter E).
simple induction E; intros A f r.
intros a e; simpl in a.
cut (IN E' E''); auto with zfc.
cut (IN E' (f a)); auto with zfc.
cut (forall x : A, IN (pi2 (f a) b) (f x)).
exists (dep_i A (fun a : A => depprod (pi1 (f a)) (fun b : pi1 (f a) => forall x : A, IN (pi2 (f a) b) (f x))) a (dep_i (pi1 (f a)) (fun b : pi1 (f a) => forall x : A, IN (pi2 (f a) b) (f x)) b H0)).
apply IN_sound_right with E''; auto with zfc.
Definition Power (E : Ens) : Ens := match E with | sup A f => sup _ (fun P : A -> Prop => sup _ (fun c : depprod A (fun a : A => P a) => match c with | dep_i a p => f a end)) end.
Theorem IN_Power_INC : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Power E) -> INC E' E.
intros A f r; unfold INC in |- *; simpl in |- *.
intros E'; simple induction 1; intros P.
intros E''; simple induction 1; intros a' e.
simple induction x; intros a p.
apply EQ_tran with (f' a'); auto with zfc.
Theorem INC_IN_Power : forall E E' : Ens, INC E' E -> IN E' (Power E).
simple induction E; intros A f r; unfold INC in |- *; simpl in |- *.
simple induction E'; intros A' f' r' i.
exists (fun a : A => IN (f a) (sup A' f')).
cut (EQ (f a) (f' x)); auto with zfc.
exists (dep_i A (fun a : A => EXType A' (fun y : A' => EQ (f a) (f' y))) a (EXTypei A' (fun y : A' => EQ (f a) (f' y)) x e1)).
Theorem Power_mon : forall E E' : Ens, INC E E' -> INC (Power E) (Power E').
unfold INC in |- *; unfold INC in H; intros; auto with zfc.
Theorem Power_sound : forall E E' : Ens, EQ E E' -> EQ (Power E) (Power E').
apply INC_sound_right with E; auto with zfc.
apply INC_sound_right with E'; auto with zfc.
Theorem not_EQ_Sing_Vide : forall E : Ens, EQ (Sing E) Vide -> F.
simpl in |- *; simple induction 1; intros xx; elim xx; simple induction 1.
apply IN_sound_right with (Sing E); auto with zfc.
Theorem not_EQ_Vide_Sing : forall E : Ens, EQ Vide (Sing E) -> F.
simpl in |- *; simple induction 1; intros xx; elim xx; simple induction 1.
apply IN_sound_right with (Sing E); auto with zfc.
Definition Couple (E E' : Ens) := Paire (Sing E) (Paire Vide (Sing E')).
Theorem Couple_inj_left : forall A A' B B' : Ens, EQ (Couple A A') (Couple B B') -> EQ A B.
intros x; elim x; simpl in |- *; simple induction 1; intros H3 H4; elim (H3 true); simpl in |- *; intros xx; elim xx; simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
apply EQ_tran with A; auto with zfc.
apply EQ_tran with A; auto with zfc.
change (EQ (Sing A) (Sing B) -> EQ A B) in |- *; intros EE.
apply IN_sound_right with (Sing A); auto with zfc.
change (EQ (Paire Vide (Sing A')) (Sing B) -> EQ A B) in |- *.
apply IN_sound_right with (Paire Vide (Sing A')); auto with zfc.
apply EQ_sym; apply IN_Sing_EQ; apply IN_sound_right with (Paire Vide (Sing A')); auto with zfc.
Theorem Couple_inj_right : forall A A' B B' : Ens, EQ (Couple A A') (Couple B B') -> EQ A' B'.
change (EQ (Paire Vide (Sing A')) (Sing B)) in HF.
apply IN_Sing_EQ; apply IN_sound_right with (Paire Vide (Sing A')); auto with zfc.
apply EQ_sym; apply IN_Sing_EQ; apply IN_sound_right with (Paire Vide (Sing A')); auto with zfc.
change (EQ (Paire Vide (Sing A')) (Paire Vide (Sing B')) -> EQ A' B') in |- *.
intros HI; elim (Paire_IN Vide (Sing B') (Sing A') HI).
apply IN_sound_right with (Paire Vide (Sing A')); auto with zfc.
Definition Prod (E E' : Ens) : Ens := match E, E' with | sup A f, sup A' f' => sup _ (fun c : prod_t A A' => match c with | pair_t a a' => Couple (f a) (f' a') end) end.
Theorem Couple_sound_left : forall A A' B : Ens, EQ A A' -> EQ (Couple A B) (Couple A' B).
unfold Couple in |- *; intros; auto with zfc.
Theorem Couple_sound_right : forall A B B' : Ens, EQ B B' -> EQ (Couple A B) (Couple A B').
unfold Couple in |- *; intros; auto with zfc.
Theorem Couple_IN_Prod : forall E1 E2 E1' E2' : Ens, IN E1' E1 -> IN E2' E2 -> IN (Couple E1' E2') (Prod E1 E2).
simple induction E1; intros A1 f1 r1; simple induction E2; intros A2 f2 r2.
intros x e1; simpl in x.
intros x0 e2; simpl in x.
apply IN_sound_left with (Couple (pi2 (sup A1 f1) x) (pi2 (sup A2 f2) x0)); auto with zfc.
apply EQ_tran with (Couple (pi2 (sup A1 f1) x) E2'); auto with zfc.
simple induction y; exists true; auto with zfc.
exists true; simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
Theorem Couple_Prod_IN : forall E1 E2 E1' E2' : Ens, IN (Couple E1' E2') (Prod E1 E2) -> IN E1' E1 /\ IN E2' E2.
simple induction E1; intros A1 f1 r1; simple induction E2; intros A2 f2 r2.
elim (IN_EXType (Prod (sup A1 f1) (sup A2 f2)) (Couple E1' E2') i).
intros xx; elim xx; intros a1 a2 e.
change (EQ (Couple E1' E2') (Couple (f1 a1) (f2 a2))) in e.
apply IN_sound_left with (f1 a1); auto with zfc; simpl in |- *; exists a1; auto with zfc.
apply IN_sound_left with (f2 a2); auto with zfc; simpl in |- *; exists a2; auto with zfc.
apply Couple_inj_right with (A := E1') (B := f1 a1); auto with zfc.
apply Couple_inj_left with E2' (f2 a2); auto with zfc.
Theorem IN_Prod_EXType : forall E E' E'' : Ens, IN E'' (Prod E E') -> EXType _ (fun A : Ens => EXType _ (fun B : Ens => EQ (Couple A B) E'')).
simple induction E; intros A f r; simple induction E'; intros A' f' r'.
intros; elim (IN_EXType (Prod (sup A f) (sup A' f')) E'').
intros; exists (f a); exists (f' b); auto with zfc.
Definition Succ (E : Ens) := Union (Paire E (Sing E)).

Inductive Ord : Ens -> Prop := | Oo : Ord Vide | So : forall E : Ens, Ord E -> Ord (Succ E) | Lo : forall E : Ens, (forall e : Ens, IN e E -> Ord e) -> Ord (Union E) | Eo : forall E E' : Ens, Ord E -> EQ E E' -> Ord E'.
Hint Resolve Oo So Lo: zfc.
Theorem Nat_Ord : forall n : nat, Ord (Nat n).
simple induction n; simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
Definition Omega : Ens := sup nat Nat.
Theorem IN_Succ : forall E : Ens, IN E (Succ E).
intros E; unfold Succ in |- *; unfold Sing in |- *; apply IN_Union with (Paire E E); auto with zfc.
Theorem INC_Succ : forall E : Ens, INC E (Succ E).
unfold INC in |- *; unfold Succ in |- *.
apply IN_Union with E; auto with zfc.
Theorem IN_Succ_or : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Succ E) -> EQ E E' \/ IN E' E.
intros E1; simple induction 1; intros i1 i2.
intros; right; apply IN_sound_right with E1; auto with zfc.
apply IN_sound_right with E1; auto with zfc.
Theorem E_not_IN_E : forall E : Ens, IN E E -> F.
simple induction E; intros A f r i.
elim (IN_EXType (sup A f) (sup A f) i); intros a e.
change (EQ (sup A f) (f a)) in e.
apply IN_sound_right with (sup A f); auto with zfc.
Theorem Nat_IN_Omega : forall n : nat, IN (Nat n) Omega.
intros; simpl in |- *; exists n; auto with zfc.
Theorem IN_Omega_EXType : forall E : Ens, IN E Omega -> EXType _ (fun n : nat => EQ (Nat n) E).
Theorem IN_Nat_EXType : forall (n : nat) (E : Ens), IN E (Nat n) -> EXType _ (fun p : nat => EQ E (Nat p)).
elim (IN_Omega_EXType E H); intros n e.
auto with zfc; try auto with zfc.
change (IN (Nat n) (Succ (Nat n))) in |- *; auto with zfc.
apply IN_sound_left with (Nat x); auto with zfc.
apply IN_sound_right with e; auto with zfc.
apply Eo with (Nat n); auto with zfc.
change (Ord (Succ (Nat n0))) in |- *; auto with zfc.
simple induction 1; intros A f r.

Definition collection := forall P : Ens -> Ens -> Prop, (forall x x' y : Ens, EQ x x' -> P x y -> P x' y) -> (forall E : Ens, EXType _ (P E)) -> forall E : Ens, EXType _ (fun A : Ens => forall x : Ens, IN x E -> EXType _ (fun y : Ens => IN y A /\ P x y)).
Definition choice := forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop), (forall a : A, EXType _ (fun b : B => P a b)) -> EXType _ (fun f : A -> B => forall a : A, P a (f a)).
unfold collection in |- *; intro; intros P comp G E.
cut (EXType _ (fun f : Ens -> Ens => forall B : Ens, P B (f B))).
elim E; intros A g hr; intros.
exists (sup A (fun a : A => f (g a))).
apply comp with (g a); auto with zfc.
elim (G a); intros b hb; exists b; auto with zfc.
Definition functional (P : Ens -> Ens -> Prop) := forall x y y' : Ens, P x y -> P x y' -> EQ y y'.

Definition replacement := forall P : Ens -> Ens -> Prop, functional P -> (forall x y y' : Ens, EQ y y' -> P x y -> P x y') -> (forall x x' y : Ens, EQ x x' -> P x y -> P x' y) -> forall X : Ens, EXType _ (fun Y : Ens => forall y : Ens, (IN y Y -> EXType _ (fun x : Ens => IN x X /\ P x y)) /\ (EXType _ (fun x : Ens => IN x X /\ P x y) -> IN y Y)).
Theorem classical_Collection_Replacement : (forall S : Prop, S \/ (S -> False)) -> collection -> replacement.
unfold replacement in |- *; intros EM Collection P fp comp_r comp_l X.
cut (EXType _ (fun Y : Ens => forall y : Ens, EXType _ (fun x : Ens => IN x X /\ P x y) -> IN y Y)).
exists (Comp Y (fun y : Ens => EXType _ (fun x : Ens => IN x X /\ P x y))).
apply (IN_Comp_P Y y (fun y0 : Ens => EXType Ens (fun x : Ens => IN x X /\ P x y0))); auto with zfc.
intros w1 w2; simple induction 1; intros x; simple induction 1; intros Ix Px e.
exists x; split; auto with zfc.
apply comp_r with w1; auto with zfc.
intros w1 w2; simple induction 1; intros x; simple induction 1; intros Ix Px e.
exists x; split; auto with zfc.
apply comp_r with w1; auto with zfc.
elim (Collection (fun x y : Ens => P x y \/ (forall y' : Ens, P x y' -> False) /\ EQ y Vide)) with X.
elim (EM (EXType _ (fun x : Ens => IN x X /\ P x Vide))).
intros Hvide; elim Hvide; intros xv Hxv; exists Y.
intros y; simple induction 1; intros x; simple induction 1; intros Hx1 Hx2.
intros y'; simple induction 1; intros Hy'1 Hy'2.
intros Hy'3; apply IN_sound_left with y'; auto with zfc.
apply fp with x; auto with zfc.
intros HP; exists (Comp Y (fun y : Ens => EQ y Vide -> False)).
intros y; simple induction 1; intros x; simple induction 1; intros Hx1 Hx2.
intros w1 w2 Hw1 Hw Hw2; apply Hw1; apply EQ_tran with w2; auto with zfc.
intros y'; simple induction 1; intros Hy'1 Hy'2.
apply IN_sound_left with y'; auto with zfc.
apply fp with x; auto with zfc.
intros e; apply HP; exists x; split; auto with zfc; apply comp_r with y; auto with zfc; apply fp; auto with zfc.
intros x x' y e Hx; elim Hx; intros Hx1.
left; apply comp_l with x; auto with zfc.
right; elim Hx1; intros Hx2 Hx3; split.
intros y' Hy'; apply (Hx2 y'); apply comp_l with x'; auto with zfc.
intros x; elim (EM (EXType _ (fun y : Ens => P x y))); intros Hx.
elim Hx; intros x0 Hx0; exists x0; left; assumption.
exists Vide; right; split; auto with zfc.
intros y Hy; elim Hx; exists y; auto with zfc.
simple induction 1; intros A f eq1.
simple induction 1; intros B g eq2.
exact (forall x : A, depprod _ (fun y : B => eq1 x (g y))).
exact (forall y : B, depprod _ (fun x : A => eq1 x (g y))).
exact (depprod _ (fun y : A => EQC X (e y))).
exact (forall E : Ens, CIN E E1 -> CIN E E2).
Theorem EQC_refl : forall E : Ens, EQC E E.
Theorem EQC_tran : forall E1 E2 E3 : Ens, EQC E1 E2 -> EQC E2 E3 -> EQC E1 E3.
simple induction E1; simple induction E2; simple induction E3; simpl in |- *; intros.
split; (elim X2; intros; elim X3; intros).
apply X with (e0 x0); auto with zfc.
apply X with (e0 x); auto with zfc.
Theorem EQC_sym : forall E1 E2 : Ens, EQC E1 E2 -> EQC E2 E1.
simple induction E1; simple induction E2; simpl in |- *; intros.
elim (a y); intros; exists x; auto with zfc.
Theorem EQC_INC : forall E E' : Ens, EQC E E' -> CINC E E'.
simple induction E; simple induction E'; simpl in |- *; intros; unfold CINC in |- *; simpl in |- *.
exists x0; apply EQC_tran with (e x); auto with zfc.
Hint Resolve EQC_sym EQC_refl EQC_INC: zfc.
Theorem CINC_EQC : forall E E' : Ens, CINC E E' -> CINC E' E -> EQC E E'.
simple induction E; simple induction E'; unfold CINC in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros; split; intros.
cut (depprod A (fun x : A => EQC (e0 y) (e x))); try (simple induction 1; intros x p; exists x; auto with zfc).
apply X2; exists y; auto with zfc.
Theorem CIN_sound_left : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQC E E' -> CIN E E'' -> CIN E' E''.
simple induction E''; simpl in |- *; intros.
elim X1; intros y p; exists y.
apply EQC_tran with E; auto with zfc.
Theorem CIN_sound_right : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQC E' E'' -> CIN E E' -> CIN E E''.
simple induction E'; simple induction E''; simpl in |- *; intros.
elim X1; intros Xl Xr; elim X2; intros y p; elim (Xl y); intros y0 p0; exists y0; apply EQC_tran with (e y); auto with zfc.
Theorem CINC_refl : forall E : Ens, CINC E E.
unfold CINC in |- *; auto with zfc.
Theorem CINC_tran : forall E E' E'' : Ens, CINC E E' -> CINC E' E'' -> CINC E E''.
unfold CINC in |- *; auto with zfc.
Theorem CINC_sound_left : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQC E E' -> CINC E E'' -> CINC E' E''.
simple induction E''; unfold CINC in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros A f XR e X1 E0 i; apply X1.
apply CIN_sound_right with E'; auto with zfc.
Theorem CINC_sound_right : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQC E' E'' -> CINC E E' -> CINC E E''.
simple induction E'; simple induction E''; unfold CINC in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros.
elim X1; intros XA XB; elim (XA x); intros.
exists x0; apply EQC_tran with (e x); auto with zfc.
Theorem tout_vide_est_VideC : forall E : Ens, (forall E' : Ens, CIN E' E -> F) -> EQC E Vide.
unfold Vide in |- *; simple induction E; simpl in |- *; intros A e X H; split.
intros; elim (H (e x)); auto with zfc.
Theorem Paire_sound_leftC : forall A A' B : Ens, EQC A A' -> EQC (Paire A B) (Paire A' B).
Theorem Paire_sound_rightC : forall A B B' : Ens, EQC B B' -> EQC (Paire A B) (Paire A B').
unfold Paire in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros; split.
Theorem CIN_Paire_left : forall E E' : Ens, CIN E (Paire E E').
unfold Paire in |- *; simpl in |- *; exists true; simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
Theorem CIN_Paire_right : forall E E' : Ens, CIN E' (Paire E E').
unfold Paire in |- *; simpl in |- *; exists false; simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
Inductive sum_t (A B : Type) : Type := | inl_t : A -> sum_t A B | inr_t : B -> sum_t A B.
Theorem Paire_CIN : forall E E' A : Ens, CIN A (Paire E E') -> sum_t (EQC A E) (EQC A E').
unfold Paire in |- *; simpl in |- *; simple induction 1; intros b; elim b; simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
Theorem CIN_Sing : forall E : Ens, CIN E (Sing E).
unfold Sing in |- *; auto with zfc.
Theorem CIN_Sing_EQ : forall E E' : Ens, CIN E (Sing E') -> EQC E E'.
unfold Sing in |- *; intros E E' H; elim (Paire_CIN E' E' E); auto with zfc.
Theorem EQC_EQ : forall E E' : Ens, EQC E E' -> EQ E E'.
simple induction E; intros A f ra; simple induction E'; intros B g rb; simpl in |- *; simple induction 1; intros H1 H2; split.
intros a; elim (H1 a); intros b; intros; exists b; auto with zfc.
intros b; elim (H2 b); intros a; intros; exists a; auto with zfc.
Theorem CIN_IN : forall E E' : Ens, CIN E E' -> IN E E'.
simple induction E; intros A f ra; simple induction E'; intros B g rb; simple induction 1; intros a; unfold IN in |- *; exists a; auto with zfc.
Theorem EQC_EXType : forall E E' : Ens, EQC E E' -> forall a : pi1 E, depprod (pi1 E') (fun b : pi1 E' => EQC (pi2 E a) (pi2 E' b)).
simple induction E; simple induction E'; simpl in |- *.
Theorem CIN_EXType : forall E E' : Ens, CIN E' E -> depprod (pi1 E) (fun a : pi1 E => EQC E' (pi2 E a)).
Theorem CIN_Union : forall E E' E'' : Ens, CIN E' E -> CIN E'' E' -> CIN E'' (Union E).
simple induction E; intros A f r.
cut (EQC (pi2 (sup A f) x) E'); auto with zfc.
exists (dep_i A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x)) x x0).
apply CIN_sound_right with E'; auto with zfc.
Theorem CIN_CINC_Union : forall E E' : Ens, CIN E' E -> CINC E' (Union E).
unfold CINC in |- *; simple induction E; intros A f r.
exists (dep_i A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x)) x x1); auto with zfc.
apply CIN_sound_right with E'; auto with zfc.
Inductive depprod' (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) : Type := dep_i' : forall x : A, P x -> depprod' A P.
Theorem Union_CIN : forall E E' : Ens, CIN E' (Union E) -> depprod' _ (fun E1 : Ens => prod_t (CIN E1 E) (CIN E' E1)).
simple induction E; unfold Union in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros A f r.
apply CIN_sound_left with (pi2 (f a) b); auto with zfc.
generalize b; elim (f a); simpl in |- *.
Theorem Union_soundC : forall E E' : Ens, EQC E E' -> EQC (Union E) (Union E').
simple induction E; intros A f r; simple induction E'; intros A' f' r'.
exists (dep_i A' (fun x : A' => pi1 (f' x)) x1 x2).
cut (EQC (f' x) (f x0)); auto with zfc.
elim (EQC_EXType (f' x) (f x0) e p); intros.
exists (dep_i A (fun x0 : A => pi1 (f x0)) x0 x1).
Theorem Union_monC : forall E E' : Ens, CINC E E' -> CINC (Union E) (Union E').
apply CIN_Union with x; elim p; intros; auto with zfc.
Inductive Ens' : Type := sup' : forall A : Type, (A -> Ens') -> Ens'.
Inductive EXType' (P : Type) (Q : P -> Prop) : Prop := EXTypei' : forall x : P, Q x -> EXType' P Q.
Inductive prod_t' (A B : Type) : Type := pair_t' : A -> B -> prod_t' A B.
Inductive depprod'' (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) : Type := dep_i'' : forall x : A, P x -> depprod'' A P.
simple induction 1; intros A f eq1.
simple induction 1; intros B g eq2.
exact (forall x : A, EXType' _ (fun y : B => eq1 x (g y))).
exact (forall y : B, EXType' _ (fun x : A => eq1 x (g y))).
simple induction 1; intros A f fr.
Theorem inj_sound : forall E1 E2 : Ens', EQ' E1 E2 -> EQ (inj E1) (inj E2).
simple induction E1; intros A1 f1 fr1; simple induction E2; intros A2 f2 r2; simpl in |- *.
simple induction 1; intros HR1 HR2; split.
intros a1; elim (HR1 a1); intros a2 Ha2; exists a2; auto with zfc.
intros a2; elim (HR2 a2); intros a1 Ha1; exists a1; auto with zfc.
Definition Power' (E : Ens') : Ens' := match E with | sup' A f => sup' _ (fun P : A -> Prop => sup' _ (fun c : depprod'' A (fun a : A => P a) => match c with | dep_i'' a p => f a end)) end.
Theorem Power_sound_inj : forall E : Ens', EQ (inj (Power' E)) (Power (inj E)).
simple induction E; intros A f HR.
intros c; elim c; intros a p.
exists (dep_i A (fun a0 : A => P a0) a p); simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
intros c; elim c; intros a p.
exists (dep_i'' A (fun a0 : A => P a0) a p); simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
intros c; elim c; intros a p.
exists (dep_i A (fun a0 : A => P a0) a p); simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
intros c; elim c; intros a p.
exists (dep_i'' A (fun a0 : A => P a0) a p); simpl in |- *; auto with zfc.
Theorem Big_is_big : forall E : Ens', IN (inj E) Big.
intros E; unfold Big in |- *; simpl in |- *; exists E; auto with zfc.
Theorem IN_Big_small : forall E : Ens, IN E Big -> EXType' _ (fun E' : Ens' => EQ E (inj E')).
unfold Big in |- *; simpl in |- *; simple induction 1; intros E' HE'; exists E'; auto with zfc.
Theorem IN_small_small : forall (E : Ens) (E' : Ens'), IN E (inj E') -> EXType' _ (fun E1 : Ens' => EQ E (inj E1)).
simple induction E'; intros A' f' HR'; simpl in |- *; simple induction 1; intros a' e'; exists (f' a'); auto with zfc.
Theorem Big_closed_for_power : forall E : Ens, IN E Big -> IN (Power E) Big.
unfold Big in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros E; simple induction 1; intros E' HE'; exists (Power' E').
Theorem Russell : forall E : Ens, (forall E' : Ens, IN E' E) -> False.
cut ((fun x : Ens => IN x x -> False) (Comp U (fun x : Ens => IN x x -> False))).
intros w1 w2 HF e i; apply HF; apply IN_sound_left with w2; auto with zfc; apply IN_sound_right with w2; auto with zfc.
cut (IN (Comp U (fun x : Ens => IN x x -> False)) (Comp U (fun x : Ens => IN x x -> False))).
change ((fun x : Ens => IN x x -> False) (Comp U (fun x : Ens => IN x x -> False))) in |- *.
cut (forall w1 w2 : Ens, (IN w1 w1 -> False) -> EQ w1 w2 -> IN w2 w2 -> False).
exact (IN_Comp_P U (Comp U (fun x : Ens => IN x x -> False)) (fun x : Ens => IN x x -> False) ww H).
intros w1 w2 HF e i; apply HF; apply IN_sound_left with w2; auto with zfc; apply IN_sound_right with w2; auto with zfc.
